column3: Note the URL under Open access compliance. Click the first 'Edit this section' box

column4: You are taken to Page 1 Open access compliance

column3: Change the URL and click 'Review your answers' on the progress bar
Click 'Edit this section', scroll to the bottom of the page and click Next

column4: You are taken to Page 2 About and all your answers are preserved

column3: Click Review your answers on the Progress bar

column4: You are taken back to Page 7 -  Review you answers

column3: Scroll to the bottom and click try to click Submit

column4: The Submit button is greyed out.
The Submit button goes grey again

column3: Check the consent box and click Submit

column4: The application submits and you are shown the confrmation page
